title: Hu Haifeng
summary: Hu Haifeng (Chinese: 胡海峰; pinyin: Hú Hǎifēng; born November 1972) is a Chinese politician and the son of Hu Jintao, former General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and Paramount leader of China. He is currently the CCP Committee Secretary of Lishui, Zhejiang, and previously the deputy CCP Committee Secretary and mayor of Jiaxing.
